availabilityText: Open to Information Systems, Systems Analyst, Data Analyst, and IT Administrator roles
subtitle: Information Systems, Data Analyst & IT Administrator
title: Hi, I'm David!
introText: I'm an Information Systems and Data Analyst who also works as an IT Administrator, with a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science and over 9 years supporting academic IT environments, operational reporting workflows, and enterprise service delivery. I lead system analysis, data process improvements, and operational reliability across Windows and Linux platforms, with practical experience in business applications, Active Directory, and identity/access controls. I also run hands-on home-lab scenarios with enterprise switching, VLAN configuration, IP addressing, and isolated test environments.
